img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/10/Wukong_UpperHollow_20.jpg)
Return back to the first large area filled with cocoons to the right of the Upper Hollow Shrine, and look for the pit in the middle with a wooden platform ledge you can use to drop down to a slightly lower floor.
img_below_text:
A Puppet Spider will be waiting for you down here, as well as a green Wisp off in a darkened ledge.
![Wukong UpperHollow 22.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/ff/Wukong_UpperHollow_22.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 22 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/10/Wukong_UpperHollow_20.jpg)
Return back to the first large area filled with cocoons to the right of the Upper Hollow Shrine, and look for the pit in the middle with a wooden platform ledge you can use to drop down to a slightly lower floor."
            - Following Text: "A Puppet Spider will be waiting for you down here, as well as a green Wisp off in a darkened ledge.
![Wukong UpperHollow 22.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/ff/Wukong_UpperHollow_22.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character holding a staff with a glowing red tip, standing in a dimly lit cave. The character is facing a darkened ledge where a green Wisp is visible, highlighted by a red dashed circle. This setting follows a descent to a lower floor in the Upper Hollow area, where a Puppet Spider enemy is anticipated. The image serves to illustrate the player's next objective and the presence of the green Wisp in the darkened area.
